name: Head Unavailble
description:
Enjoyed the journey very much!

Theme: Stronger Together

Our Robot is a very powerful robot and can fight in the robo arena. But he is only powerful when he hasn't lost his head(literally). This is a game about a robot with a very unstable head. Which is most of the times Unavailble (Intentional Spelling Mistake)

Thanks in advance for playing!

How to play:
Press Z to attack, Space to dodge. Be wary of your stability bar; your head will fall off once it depletes! Kick your head towards hostile enemies to recharge stamina and gain back your head.

Artist:

TarMunt

Developers:

FireBlaze236

spiritinchains

Open Assets used:
https://ansimuz.itch.io/explosion-animations-pack

Sound effects from:
https://freesound.org/
